__e: Now, it'll take a little time, so pay close attention.
Okay, everything's all set with Klink.
As sure as my name is Klink.
Klink, I want to talk to you.
Klink, I want you to make the written report.
Don't let Klink catch you eating with us, huh.
Klink! You are dismissed, and take them with you.
Oui. And if you say one word, we will tell Klink you knew about this.
I go to Klink first. He's in.
I've been giving a great deal of thought to you, Klink, and I must say, I strongly disapprove of you.
Ja, Klink, there is one vital thing.
He told it to me himself.
Actually, Klink gave me the idea.
Commandant Klink doesn't let us use it very often.
Okay. I'll see what Klink wants.
But after catching her with Schultz, Klink will never agree to see her.
